mapper.select: select title, level, content, td.id as id, username as userName, user_id as userId, ts.id as schoolId, ts.school_name as schoolName, td.create_date as createDate from tb_demand td inner join tb_school ts on td.school_id = ts.id inner join tb_user tu on td.user_id = tu.id order by level desc limit ${page.start}, ${page.rows}
